content: leave a space of a quarter inch fig 11 make second half of ds slide ds next to previous ds made close ring fig 12 make 8 ds p 8 ds fig 13 pass ball thread over the back of right hand place right thumb on ball thread in front of hook yo fig 14 with hook facing down hold stitches between index and thumb finger of right hand pull through all loops on hook fig 15 insert hook in loop at other end of work you now have two loops on hook fig 16 without removing hook from loops lift hook pulling on inside loop fig 17 pull on ball thread to tighten enlarged inside loop fig 18 yo pull through both loops on hook fig 19 crochet tatted lace ring made crochet tatted lace doily designer ferosa harold pattern left handed instructions materials for thread cro tat thread hook older hook or the new size 6 hook 1 ball of size 10 thread for yarn cro tat yarn hook size e if you have another size cro tat hook for yarn that will work also 1skien cotton worsted weight yarn gauge daisy = 1 5/8inches basic stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch reverse slip_stitch ds p special stitches jdc joined double_crochet yo insert hook in specified st yo pull up yo draw through two loops on hook yo insert hook in specified st yo and pull up yo draw through two loops yo and pull through remaining loops on hook bullion st yo 8 times insert hook in specified st yo and pull up yo and draw through all loops on hook finished size 7 5 inches diameter instructions round 01 chain 8 slip_stitch in first chain st to form ring chain 1 12 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 02 working from right to left of work * make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds reverse slip_stitch in next two single_crochet 6 times fasten_off leave at least 6 inches of thread to weave in daisy completed round 03 make ring of 5 ds p 5 ds joined p in p of any petal of center daisy 5 ds p 5 ds close ring * chain 10 make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds p twice 5 ds close ring chain 10 make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds joined p in next p of daisy 5 ds p 5 ds 5 times make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds p 5 ds joined p in first p of first ring 5 ds close ring chain 5 dtr in first of chain 10 at beginning of round round 04 chain 1 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 single_crochet in same place as join * in next chain 10 space work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 times 3 single_crochet around in next space work
